resources.string: New recording can be started in Details. Stop recording in Details or notification
Add new stations in Details. Drag and drop to move stations into playlists. Swipe away to delete
Add new stations in Details. Drag and drop to move stations between playlists. Also use "Export" option of Lazy list
Stations most listened recently can be found here, excluding already favoured ones or added to playlists
Bookmark titles from Details, notification or history-titles tab itself. Swipe to delete. Click on any title to see more options
